summary: This is a Notice of Attorney Appearance filing in the case USA v. Maxwell, indicating that attorney Lawrence A. Vogelman has entered his appearance to represent defendant Ghislaine Maxwell. The document is an automated notification from the court's electronic filing system.

keyFacts: Lawrence A. Vogelman entered his appearance as defense attorney for Ghislaine Maxwell on July 6, 2020.
The case is USA v. Maxwell, case number 1:20-mj-00132-AJ.
The document is an automated notification from the court's CM/ECF electronic filing system.
Ghislaine Maxwell is identified as the defendant in the criminal proceeding.
